name: Wolf Must Die
description:
Wolf Must Die is a Virtual Reality casual archery game that adults and children can enjoy together. Defend yourself from hordes of angry wolves charging to attack you and your villages houses! Take on armored wolves, cannons and pesky flying.. eye-bat... things. Heal yourself and your houses and quickly grab coins that drop to increase your score to rise to the top of the leaderboard.

Be ready, things can get quite frantic quite quickly as those pesky wolves increase their efforts! With You will find yourself spinning, checking over your shoulder and flying off those arrows as fast as you can. Try to learn the attack paths and take advantage of the checkpoint system to get the the end.

Once you have mastered the Day, try the Night level if you dare!
